meanings.definition: The quality or state of being consistent.
meanings.sent1: Her consistences in punctuality and hard work earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The consistences in his behavior made him a reliable friend.
meanings.sent3: The robot's consistences in following instructions were both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The consistences in the team's performance were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The consistences in the recipe ensured a delicious outcome every time.

meanings.definition: The act or process of consisting.
meanings.sent1: The consistences of various ingredients led to a perfect dish.
meanings.sent2: The consistences of the team members were crucial for the project's success.
meanings.sent3: The consistences of the puzzle pieces coming together were oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The consistences of the music and dance created a harmonious performance.
meanings.sent5: The consistences of the colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The substance or material that makes up something.
meanings.sent1: The consistences of the building blocks determined the stability of the tower.
meanings.sent2: The consistences of the fabric were soft and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The consistences of the cake batter made it difficult to resist licking the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The consistences of the words formed a powerful message.
meanings.sent5: The consistences of the clay allowed the artist to sculpt intricate details.
